text: Futhi bafika kuyena abantu bakhe bejahe kuyena futhi nangaphambilini babejwayele ukwenza izinto ezimbi, (uLothi) wathi “Oh bantu bami! lawa ngamadodakazi ami wona amsulwa ngokwedlulele kunina ngakho-ke sabani uMvelinqangi ningangihlazi ezivakashini zami, ngakube ayikho yini kunina indoda ehlakaniphile na?”
